Greater capacity  is possible when SD memory cards are also used (2 card slots). ** 1920 x 1080 movie recording requires a Class 4 or higher memory card.  For other recording formats, a Class 2 or higher card is recommended.  Also, movie recording requires cards with 128MB of memory or more. Cards  made by Toshiba, SanDisk or Matsushita are recommended. No particular  restrictions apply for still images.
